asrsegments.said: so let's see we will move on to town
manager report or town manager
announcements Tom thank you next meeting
I think she's going to want to do an
executive session to discuss possibly
upcoming Union negotiations and possibly
other things not sure also Gary Stone
from First Investors has asked to come to
that meeting as well to explain how are
investments have been doing I think I
sent out the Investments a few weeks back
and they have been doing very well and he
wanted to explain them in layman's terms
better than I could so he'll be at the
next meeting also I received in the mail
just recently a bunch of papers from
Department of Transportation informing me
that they're going to be doing some
construction in the downtown we already
knew it's basically in front of the
Popcorn Shop they're going to be fixing
some drainage down there that's why the
Sewer District left the road somewhat
open still so that when they go back in
it they want to go through payment again
but in this notification they have asked
for the Selectmen to sign off on them
bringing over weight limit trucks down on
their road which strikes me is kind of
license is there road anyway but I assume
the selection wouldn't have any problem
with signing that off to say they could
bring their trucks down so that's going
to be hopefully at the end of the meeting
and last but not least I just wanted to
do a shout-out for Public Works that only
for Boothbay Harbor but Boothbay as well
tremendous snow storm we just had and
everybody's working round the Round the
Clock to dig out and hopefully tomorrow
this evening tomorrow won't be too bad
but just thank you to all of them for
their hard work and they do a lot to keep
us safe got done a great job and I
thought I would just remind people about
something I heard on the TV news and that
is is that I'm sure that public works and
the fire department would appreciate if
people helped dig out around the fire
hydrants because it's always good to have
the fire hydrants completely unencumbered
in case of an emergency at the
intersections where their banks are so
high any help and chopping some of those
down for visibility would be great
because we have to stick her cars out
into the street at the moment to see
what's coming that's that's their next
Quest is to knock those all down your
exhaust roll paint exhausts Dugout and if
you have a dryer make sure that is dug
out before you do any of that stuff Tom
can you since we're having it recorded
tonight can you remind people I can pull
it up on my phone cuz I was in the
register but this is the time for people
to think about elections that are coming
up and put their names in for bacon spots
I know school district has 2 spots were
available I know at least four Town
committees we have we have several
positions open on the budget Committee of
the other boards and committees are
relatively full but the budget, he
definitely needs more people we have
three and it should be a board of 7 in
the January through March so it's a
short. Of time short time commitment very
important very helpful to have more
opinions looking at the budget for town
meeting I'm trying to pull
